item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Daniel Borek. I am a Phd student at the Department of Data Analysis, Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences (FPPW), Ghent University.

item.title: Hugo tricks
item.description: How to setup a Hugo page with Github pages and Hugo Hugo is really popular static site generator. Before Hugo I used Jekyll. Configuring Hugo to use your page on Github is little more complicated than with Jekyll. Here you could find the tutorial. When you use setup with gh-pages branch remember to set Jekyll theme (even when your page doesn’t use Jekyll). Here yuou could find interesting blogpost about guide to file structure and organisation.
